game.name: Number Composition
game.description:
What could be a better idea to enjoy the racing game while also improving your addition abilities? Luckily, we have brought to you today a brand new arcade challenge where you can win the racing competition only if you have the skill to reply perfectly to the additional queries. Do you think that you can handle both things at the same time? If yes, join the Number Composition game and gear up to allow yourself to participate in an exciting rally.

You can ask your child to play it out and let him understand the composition of the number while also participating in the biggest car racing competition of the city. There are 9 unique and addictive levels to play through with different number compositions including 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 and 10. The number of questions will keep increasing as you advance in the game. Like, in the 2 level, you will be asked two composition questions, while you will have to solve 9 compositions in the 9 level.

Your every successful task will be welcomed with the colorful stars that you will see coming from the bottom. Complete all queries to become a composition king in just a few clicks! We have plenty of free number compositions games on our website for both boys and girls. Play these cool HTML5 online games on multiple latest platforms including smartphones, tablets, and iPads, and iPhones. Good luck!
